description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Devtools: workspace connection timeline & OpenCode connect timings — new developer tools panels that log workspace connection lifecycle and OpenCode connect latency (#510, #511, #515)
- Diagnostics bundle copy — one-click export of config diagnostics for troubleshooting (#513)
Fixes & polish
- Input debounce & echo cancellation to reduce composer lag (#509)
- Restyle Cloud waitlist section to match existing design
- Test connection menu added to workspace context menu (#512)
Packaging / ops
- Auto-build dev:headless-web binaries (#514)
- AUR PKGBUILD updated for 0.11.43
